amendment.description: Amendment transfers $1 million from the Department of Energy's Departmental administration budget to the Corps of Engineers' investigations budget to address a backlog of Corps of Engineers projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Investigations by $1 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
